hero.title: Next.js Boilerplate for Your Software Development Business
hero.subtitle: Handcrafted Next.js starter for your next Startup, Business, or Software Development Project. Comes with modern design, advanced integrations, and everything you need to kickstart your web projects using Docker, NestJS, Rust, React, Vue, Flutter, Machine Learning, and more.

items.title: Crafted for Software Development
items.description: Built specifically for modern applications with scalable architecture using Docker, NestJS, and Rust.

items.title: High-quality Design
items.description: Meticulously crafted design system with a focus on user experience and modern aesthetics.

items.title: UI Components and Pages
items.description: Comprehensive collection of reusable components and pre-built page templates with React and Vue.

items.title: Key Integrations
items.description: Pre-configured integrations with Firebase, KrakenD, SQL, and APIs for rapid development.

items.title: Fully Customizable
items.description: Easily customizable components and layouts to match your brand and requirements.

items.title: Regular Updates
items.description: Continuous updates with new features, security patches, and performance improvements.

about.title: Know More About Devall
about.description: We are a team of passionate developers and designers committed to creating exceptional digital solutions. Our Next.js starter template combines cutting-edge technologies like Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Flutter with innovative designs to help businesses succeed in software development.

items: Database integration with Firebase and PostgreSQL
